# `rssx`

Barebones feed-reader intended to be used with a static-site generator.

## Usage

```bash
$ cat rss.txt
https://nshipster.com/feed.xml
https://jvns.ca/atom.xml
https://pspdfkit.com/blog/feed.atom

# Full output elided
$ cat rss.txt | rssx
# RSS

*Autogenerated by [rssx](https://github.com/timothyandrew/rssx) on 2020-07-07*

## [Inside PSPDFKit](https://pspdfkit.com/blog)

*By pspdfkit.com; last updated: 2020-07-01 15:00:00 +00:00*

* [Direct Calls with Objective-C](https://pspdfkit.com/blog/2020/improving-performance-via-objc-direct/)
* [PSPDFKit Adds Redaction and Improved Digital Signatures to Web](https://pspdfkit.com/blog/2020/pspdfkit-adds-redaction-and-improved-digital-signatures-to-web/)

## [Julia Evans](http://jvns.ca)

*By Julia Evans; last updated: 2020-07-05 08:51:55 +00:00*

* [saturday comics: a weekly mailing list of programming comics](https://jvns.ca/blog/2020/07/05/saturday-comics/)
* [Tell candidates what to expect from your job interviews](https://jvns.ca/blog/2020/06/30/tell-candidates-what-to-expect-from-your-job-interviews/)

## [NSHipster](https://nshipster.com/feed.xml)

*By Mattt; last updated: 2020-06-27 07:55:36 -07:00*

* [WWDC 2020](https://nshipster.com/wwdc-2020)
* [Language Server Protocol](https://nshipster.com/language-server-protocol)
```
